sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col>
      <v-list
          subheader
      >
        <v-subheader class="mt-4">
          <v-icon class="mr-4">mdi-twitter</v-icon>
          REDES SOCIALES
        </v-subheader>
      </v-list>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item>
          <v-combobox
              prepend-icon="mdi-earth"
              label="Redes disponibles"
              :items=allNetworksForCombo
              multiple
              chips
              @change=addNetwork
          ></v-combobox>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-list-item v-for="net in actorNetworks" :key=net.name>
          <v-text-field
              :prepend-icon=net.icon
              :label="'Direccion de '+net.name"
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "ActorEditMultimedia",
  data: () => ({
    allNetworksForCombo: ['Twitter','Youtube','Instagram','Facebook','Web'],
    allNetworks: [
      {
        name: 'Twitter',
        icon: 'mdi-twitter',
        url: ''
      },
      {
        name: 'Youtube',
        icon: 'mdi-youtube',
        url: ''
      },
      {
        name: 'Instagram',
        icon: 'mdi-instagram',
        url: ''
      },
      {
        name: 'Facebook',
        icon: 'mdi-facebook',
        url: ''
      },
      {
        name: 'Web',
        icon: 'mdi-earth',
        url: ''
      }
    ],
    actorNetworks: []
  }),
  methods: {
    addNetwork(network){
      console.log(network)
      this.allNetworks.find( net => {
        if (net.name === network[0]){
          this.actorNetworks.push(net);
        }
      });
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
